## Introduction

The data-import functions can be used to convert a LacyTools summary file to a format suitable for R. 

```{r load-data}

data <- read_non_rectangular(system.file("extdata", 
                                         "2021-10-22-0334Z_Summary.txt", 
                                         package = "glycodash"),
                             delim = "\t")


```
